name: Saunalautta Royale
description:
Saunalautta Royale
What if we took saunalautta (sauna raft), strapped guns to them and went to battle? Saunalautta Royale combines the idea of weaponized saunalautta with a multiplayer battle royale for the ultimate aquatic sauna battle experience. Start with a regular saunalautta,  build it up with guns and scavenge your fallen enemies for more parts to build the ultimate battle sauna and fight your way to victory!

DISCLAIMER:
This game is not a finished product or even a well working prototype!!! Judge it accordingly...please

Controls:
Move - WASD
Look - Mouse
Shoot - Left mouse button
Upgrade menu - Tab
Pause Menu - Escape

Multiplayer:
To enable multiplayer you must have Steam installed, open and logged in to an account to host public lobbies or join existing ones.
In the game click play -> new game to open a new session.
To join click Play - > Refresh to see open lobbies and then click Join in the server list
